title: The Giving Tree
short_plot_summary: A loving tree provides everything and anything for a boy from childhood to old age, including comfort and resources, even while sacrificing itself.
explanation: A child, depicting the boy who starts as a young child and grows old throughout the story
A tree, representing the Giving Tree, the loving and selfless main character of the story
An apple, symbolizing the fruit the tree provides for the boy as part of its giving nature
A chair, illustrating the tree trunk being cut down for the boy to make a seat when he becomes an old man
An old man, representing the boy's growth and the passage of time in the story
